channel.title: Algorithms on VickyLai.io
channel.description: Recent content in Algorithms on VickyLai.io

item.title: How to code a satellite algorithm and cook paella fromÂ scratch
item.description:
What if I told you that by the end of this article, you’ll be able to calculate the orbital period of satellites around Earth using their average altitudes and… You tuned out already, didn’t you?

Okay, how about this: I’m going to teach you how to make paella!

True fact: people are far more likely to accept complexity if it comes with the promise of food.
